body:
Off Topic - 

So... I  was logging into another server, while waiting for the maps to be updated here, to play Sky Wars - kinda fun :) my only problem is that I cant get a game because the boards fill up so fast that I cant click the sign fast enough. LOL The 30 sign say " Searching for Servers" then for a split second they open, and withing half a sec the game is at the donator level.  I mean 1700 people trying to play sky wars is a lot, but give me a break /cry.

Anything going on here Today?

title: While waiting

replies.body: Why don't you just read the forums to find out instead of making this :]
